content: this scarf is long it is wide it is plush and cozy and warm this scarf has sleeves it is also my new favorite piece of clothing ♥ i decided to name it the give me a hygge scarf because of the way you pronounce the yarn hoo-gah give me a hoo-gah finished dimensions approx 98 x 20 pattern notes pattern written in us terms place first st of each row in same as turning note that i am currently working on a plus size version which will be slightly wider and definitely longer when finished i will update the pattern
